Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Self-important \Self`-im*por"tant\, a. Having or manifesting an exaggerated idea of one's own importance or merit. [1913 Webster]
self-important adj : having or showing feelings of unwarranted importance out of overbearing pride; "an arrogant official"; "arrogant claims"; "chesty as a peacock" [syn: {arrogant}, {chesty}]
